I don't see why everyone is bitching about the controls, it's easy to get used to after 15 minutes. Enter to open start screen

Hiiii guys for anyone having issues with the ''saved date" and the "configuration.exe" , all you have to do is run as administration with both "binarydomain.exe" & "binarydomainconfiguration.exe" that way u will find your saved date and u will no longer get an error from the config.exe .

Excellent game, good story line. Alright squad control (except they get dumb and run in your line of fire sometimes). Just beat it using keyboard controls and no mic.

Basic stuff to get you started, cause it was a little frustrating till I figured out that you need to set keyboard in two parts of the configuration tool...

Open the BinaryDomainConfiguration tool, under the second tab - Input Configuration make sure Input Device is set to keyboard. Then also at the bottom you need to make sure that Input Display Icons is also set to keyboard.
